product.title: Origin Seashell White - Venetian Blind
product.description: Seashell white instantly brings your mind back to the purity and calmness of the coastline. With everything in life taken care of at its own speed, all that is left for you to do is lie back and take in the unique aesthetic as you get the rest and relaxation you have been searching for. The perfect blend of sleek finish and gentle colouring. Origin, seashell white - venetian blind seashell white instantly brings your mind back to the purity and calmness of the coastline.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Frost Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholmfrost is an attractive, clean and crisp white colour. It will freshen up any space within the home or office. Stockholm frost fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords making them inherently child safe. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee giving extra peace of mind when investing in this product.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Snow White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm snow is a beautiful fresh white colour, it will work perfectly in most spaces. A real all rounder & great for brightening up any room. Stockholm snow fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind. relproducts.title: Oslo Blackout Frost White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Oslo is a beautiful range of blinds with a good selection of colours. The blackout feature makes it perfect for those who want to create darkness in the room at any time. The oslo blackout frost roller blind in a neutral white colour will suit almost any room. relproducts.title: Rimini White - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rimini in white is a soft, fresh shade, perfect for adding light and air to any room it's placed in. Its pale colour and lightweight fabric mean that the room doesn't have to be dark every time you need a little privacy. Brighten up even the gloomiest of rooms by placing this blind in the window; it's ideal for small utility rooms or bathrooms. Alternatively, surround with pretty florals or bold bright shades in the bedroom or living room.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Paper White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm paper is a light, off white colour. It will brighten up any room wonderfully, there is nothing fresher or more clean looking than white when dressing a window. Their stockholm paper fabric is also moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind ensuring you are purchasing a product that wwill stand the test of time.

relproducts.title: Valencia Simplicity Lilywhite Roller Blind
relproducts.description: When pure and simple is the order of the day, this valencia simplicity lilywhite roller blind is the perfect choice for you, and the perfect dressing for your home. The pure white colouring is simply perfect for blending in effortlessly with more neutral decors as well as add when pure and simple is the order of the day, this valencia simplicity lilywhite roller blind is the perfect choice for you, and the perfect dressing for your home.

relproducts.title: Oslo Blackout Paper White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This soft paper white roller blind adds bold and vibrant enhancment to your room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

relproducts.title: Stirlo Porcelain White
relproducts.description: Stirloporcelain whiteplain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.title: Origin Basic White - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The origin in basic white is made from heavy gauge aluminium guaranteed not to sag. Its wipe-clean practicality combined with the pure white, satin look finish make this blind an attractive option that is pleasing in both looks and functionality. If it's a fresh, clean style that you're looking for, blend the basic white with an all-white colour palette that's perfect for the bathroom or kitchen.

relproducts.title: Origin Magnolia - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The queen of neutrality, the magnolia version of their origin aluminium range is a simple choice that will match almost any colour it's paired with. Its satin finish and colour-coordinated cords provide it with a streamlined look that only the best of neutrals can achieve. If you love colour-blocking and continuation, go as far as setting the magnolia amongst matching magnolia walls, resulting in a clean, aerodynamic feel in a living room, hallway, or kitchen.

relproducts.title: Origin Black - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Don't be put off by the colour black's reputation; the origin in black is much more versatile, and can be far less moody, than you might think. Paired with the right dcor, the gloss aluminium slats and coordinated fittings can look simple and sophisticated. Set the black against white walls in a modern living room and complement with bright limes or fruity oranges for a step away from monochromatic living and towards boldness and colour.

relproducts.title: Origin Brushed Silver - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The ultra-metallic brushed silver from the origin range is the height of utilitarian style. With a polished, near-matte finish, the blind's aluminium slats are sturdy and hardwearing, and easily controlled using the colour-matched cords that hang from the sides. The beauty of the brushed silver is that it can be used as part of a room's central colour scheme, or incorporated as a simple accent, in the same way as a fixture or fitting might.

relproducts.title: Origin Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Dark slate in colour, the origin grey is comprised of satin-finish, heavy gauge aluminium slats, high quality pull-cords, and a clear wand tilt, resulting in a streamlined, contemporary blind. Given that the grey shade will match a multitude of hues, this is an obvious choice for those who like to change their dcor often. Go industrial in the kitchen by pairing the grey with worn metals, rustic woods, and slate floor tiles.

relproducts.title: Origin Ultramarine - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The origin ultra marine is a stand-out blue blind, with a gloss finish on strong aluminium slats. Made from only high quality materials, from the slats right through to the pull-cords, this blind is made for durability and hardiness. Take your bathroom to the seaside by coupling with pale, icy blues and pure, bright whites; or give a plain, neutral hallway or utility room a big splash of dazzling colour, offset by whites and silvers in ornaments, frames, and fittings.

relproducts.title: Origin Matt Red - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Brilliantly bold, the origin in matt red will inject life and colour into even the dullest of rooms. The satin-finish slats are made from heavy gauge aluminium, which can be adjusted to your liking using the coordinating cords. You'll love the effect the matt red has on an all-white contemporary kitchen, where it can be beautifully complemented by silver fixtures and fittings such as taps, cupboard handles, and the like.

relproducts.title: Origin Mocha - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Creamy and rich, the satin-finish origin mocha is a luxury-lover's dream. Work the adjustable slats to your heart's content, either to let the light in or keep it out, without worrying about over-use, as this durable aluminium blind is built to last. Streamline your kitchen by taking advantage of the mocha's colour-coordinated slats, cords, and rails, and pair with deeper browns or pretty turquoises to craft a refreshing and inspiring colour scheme that your guests won't be able to resist commenting on.

relproducts.title: Origin Hunter Green - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Dark and unusual, the origin in hunter green offers a perfect satin finish on slim aluminium slats, within a matching frame, and controlled using coordinating pull-cords, making this the perfect blind for both pleasure and function. For a country aesthetic with a modern twist, work the hunter green into a warm kitchen colour scheme, complementing with terracottas, soft yellows, and creams. Or make a real statement in a contemporary living room by placing it against white walls and light-coloured woods.

relproducts.title: Origin City Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: City grey combines contemporary design with an urban aesthetic to create a unique visual that takes pride of place in any room in the home. The steely character of the grey is softened by the sleek finishing and smooth surfaces of the wooden slats to create a homely addition that will enhance any space. Origin, city grey - venetian blind city grey combines contemporary design with an urban aesthetic to create a unique visual that takes pride of place in any room in the home.

relproducts.title: Origin White - Day Night Blind
relproducts.description: Using sleek, modern threads, the origin white showcases a smooth and pliable, yet strong and sturdy, fabric in an icy lily white. The cloth hosts a sliding strip of white netting that can be raised or lowered depending on your light and privacy needs. Settle the white against a red feature wall in the dining room, pairing with wooden floors and contemporary wooden furniture. Include plenty of reds and whites throughout the room, perhaps in place mats and crockery, to bring the look together.

relproducts.title: Origin Bright White - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Pure and simple in colour, the origin bright white is just as sleek and streamlined in design. Thick wooden slats, formed from ecologically managed basswood, accompany high quality components in matching white, so that you can be sure of a coordinated look offering style and coherency. The bright white will look simply striking against almost any bolder colour, but for a traditionally coastal colour scheme in the bathroom, why not team with bright teals and aquas? Keep the base of the room white and use the gorgeous green-blues to accessorise.

relproducts.title: Origin Deluxe Seashell White - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Seashell white from the origin deluxe range is an artistic blend of smooth and gentle colour on the one hand, and beautifully crafted coordinating fixtures on the other. The subtle use of colour and the effortlessly smooth texture evoke memories of relaxing down by the coast. Origin deluxe, seashell white - venetian blind seashell white from the origin deluxe range is an artistic blend of smooth and gentle colour on the one hand, and beautifully crafted coordinating fixtures on the other.

relproducts.title: Origin Deluxe Bright White - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The pure snow white of the origin deluxe in bright white has a matt appearance that is at odds with its smooth and streamlined feel. Teamed with matching, high quality components, including designer-style ladder tapes, this blind is a real style statement. Pit the bright white against a bold, focal feature wall, painted in a bright cobalt or dark navy. Alternatively, go for an attention-grabbing wallpaper to create the same effect.
